Matthew__11.6__Scandalized in me: That is, who shall not take occasion of scandal or offence from my humility, and the disgraceful death of the cross which I shall endure.
Matthew__11.12__Suffereth violence: It is not to be obtained but by main force, by using violence upon ourselves, by mortification and penance, and resisting our perverse inclinations.
Matthew__11.14__He is Elias: Not in person, but in spirit. St. Luke 1. 17.
